targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  now() as 'time_sec',
	count(a.name) as 'value'
FROM 
	users a,
	user_has_voice_queues b
WHERE
	b.voicequeueid='$campaign'
	and
	b.userid=a.id

SELECT 
  now() as 'time_sec',
	count(a.name) AS 'value'
FROM 
	users a,
	user_has_voice_queues b
WHERE
	b.voicequeueid='$campaign'
	AND (a.fullcontact IS NOT NULL AND a.fullcontact != '')
	AND b.userid=a.id

SELECT 
  dialActive,dialmethod,dialOriginateCallerIdNumber,
  CASE 
    WHEN monitor_format = '' THEN 0
    ELSE 1
  END as record,
  createdAt 
FROM 
  voice_queues 
WHERE 
  id='$campaign'

SELECT 
	a.name AS Agent
FROM 
	users a,
	user_has_voice_queues b
WHERE
	b.voicequeueid='$campaign'
	and
	b.userid=a.id

SELECT 
	a.name AS Agent,
	a.ipaddr AS 'Ip Address',
	a.useragent as 'User Agent'
FROM 
	users a,
	user_has_voice_queues b
WHERE
	b.voicequeueid='$campaign'
	AND (a.fullcontact IS NOT NULL AND a.fullcontact != '')
	AND b.userid=a.id

SELECT
  now() as 'time_sec',
  count(id) as 'value'
FROM 
  cm_hopper_history
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(starttime) and voicequeueid='$campaign'

SELECT
  now() as 'time_sec',
  count(id) as 'value'
FROM 
  cm_hopper_history
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(starttime) and state = 4 and voicequeueid='$campaign'

SELECT
  now() as 'time_sec',
  count(id) as 'value'
FROM 
  cm_hopper_history
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(starttime) and state=10 and voicequeueid='$campaign'

SELECT
  now() as 'time_sec',
  count(id) as 'value'
FROM 
  cm_hopper_history
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(starttime) and state=11 and voicequeueid='$campaign'

SELECT
  now() as 'time_sec',
  count(id) as 'value'
FROM 
  cm_hopper_history
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(starttime) and state=13 and voicequeueid='$campaign'

SELECT
  now() as 'time_sec',
  count(id) as 'value'
FROM 
  cm_hopper_history
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(starttime) and state !=4 and voicequeueid='$campaign'

SELECT
  $__timeGroup(scheduledAt,'1h') as time,
  count(id)
FROM cm_hopper
WHERE
   voiceQueueId ='$campaign'
GROUP BY $__timeGroup(scheduledAt,'1h')

SELECT
  NOW() AS time_sec,
  count(id) AS 'value',
  CASE
    WHEN active = 0 and countbusyretry = 0 and countcongestionretry = 0 and countnoanswerretry = 0 THEN "Fresh"
    when active > 0 or countbusyretry > 0 or countcongestionretry > 0 or countnoanswerretry > 0 THEN "Contacted"
  END AS metric
FROM cm_hopper
WHERE
   voiceQueueId = '$campaign'
GROUP BY
	metric

SELECT
  COUNT(a.listid) AS 'value',
  b.name AS metric
FROM 
	cm_hopper a,
	cm_lists b
WHERE
	a.listid=b.id
	and voicequeueid='$campaign'
GROUP BY metric

SELECT 
	a.name,
	COUNT(b.listid) AS total
FROM 
	cm_lists a,
	cm_hopper b
WHERE
  b.ListId=a.id
  and b.countbusyretry = 0 and b.countcongestionretry = 0 and b.countnoanswerretry = 0
  and b.countnosuchnumberretry = 0 and b.countdropretry = 0 and b.countabandonedretry = 0 and b.countmachineretry = 0
  and b.countagentrejectretry = 0
  AND b.priority > 1
  AND b.voicequeueid='$campaign'
GROUP BY
	a.name,b.listid;

SELECT
  now() as time_sec,
  COUNT(id) AS Closed 
FROM 
  cm_hopper_final 
WHERE 
  $__timeFilter(starttime)
  AND voicequeueid='$campaign'

SELECT
  now() as time_sec,
  COUNT(id) AS 'Closed' 
FROM 
  cm_hopper_final 
WHERE voicequeueid='$campaign'

SELECT
  now() as time_sec,
  count(id)
FROM cm_hopper
WHERE
   voiceQueueId = '$campaign'
  and active = 0 and countbusyretry = 0 and countcongestionretry = 0 and countnoanswerretry = 0
  and countnosuchnumberretry = 0 and countdropretry = 0 and countabandonedretry = 0 and countmachineretry = 0
  and countagentrejectretry = 0

SELECT
  now() as time_sec,
  COUNT(id) AS Closed 
FROM 
  cm_hopper_history
WHERE 
  $__timeFilter(starttime)
  AND voicequeueid='$campaign'

SELECT
  now() as time_sec,
  COUNT(id) AS Closed 
FROM 
  cm_hopper_history
WHERE 
  voicequeueid='$campaign'

SELECT
  now() as time_sec,
  count(voiceQueueId)
FROM cm_hopper
WHERE
   voiceQueueId = '$campaign'
  and Userid is null and recallme =1

SELECT
  now() as 'time_sec',
  COUNT(disposition) as 'value'
FROM cm_hopper_final
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(starttime) and lcase(disposition) like '%venta' and voicequeueid='$campaign'

SELECT
  now() as 'time_sec',
  COUNT(disposition) as 'value'
FROM cm_hopper_final
WHERE
  lcase(disposition) = 'acepta contrato' and voicequeueid='$campaign'

SELECT
	NOW() AS 'time_sec',
	COUNT(disposition) AS 'value',
	CASE
		WHEN disposition IS NULL THEN 'Not Disposed'
		ELSE disposition
	END AS metric
FROM 
	cm_hopper_final
WHERE
	$__timeFilter(starttime)
	AND voicequeueid='$campaign'
GROUP BY
	metric

SELECT
	NOW() AS 'time_sec',
	COUNT(statedesc) AS 'value',
	statedesc as 'metric'
FROM 
	cm_hopper_final
WHERE
	$__timeFilter(starttime)
	AND voicequeueid='$campaign'
GROUP BY
	metric

SELECT
	NOW() AS 'time_sec',
	COUNT(disposition) AS 'value',
	CASE
		WHEN disposition IS NULL THEN 'Not Disposed'
		ELSE disposition
	END AS metric
FROM 
	cm_hopper_final
WHERE
	voicequeueid='$campaign'
	AND disposition NOT IN ('recallme','reschedule')
GROUP BY
	metric

SELECT
	NOW() AS 'time_sec',
	COUNT(statedesc) AS 'value',
	statedesc metric
FROM 
	cm_hopper_final
WHERE
	voicequeueid='$campaign'
GROUP BY
	metric

SELECT 
  $__timeGroup(starttime,'1h') as time,
  count(disposition) as value,
  disposition as metric
FROM 
  cm_hopper_final
WHERE 
    $__timeFilter(starttime) 
  and 
    voicequeueid = '$campaign'
GROUP BY 
  metric, $__timeGroup(starttime,'1h')
ORDER BY 
$__timeGroup(starttime,'1h') ASC

SELECT 
  $__timeGroup(starttime,'1h') as time,
  count(membername) as value,
  membername as metric
FROM 
  cm_hopper_final
WHERE 
    $__timeFilter(starttime) 
  and 
    voicequeueid = '$campaign'
GROUP BY 
  metric, $__timeGroup(starttime,'1h')
ORDER BY 
$__timeGroup(starttime,'1h') ASC

SELECT 
  $__timeGroup(starttime,'1h') as time,
  count(membername) as value,
  membername as metric
FROM 
  cm_hopper_final
WHERE 
    $__timeFilter(starttime) 
	and 
    voicequeueid = '$campaign'
	and
	 LCASE(disposition) = 'acepta contrato'
GROUP BY 
  metric, $__timeGroup(starttime,'1h')
ORDER BY 
$__timeGroup(starttime,'1h') ASC

SELECT
  $__timeGroup(starttime,'1h') as time,
  count(statedesc) AS 'value',
  case
    when statedesc = 'Answer' then statedesc
    else 'No Answer'
  end AS 'metric'
FROM 
	cm_hopper_history
WHERE
   voiceQueueId = '$campaign' AND starttime IS NOT null
GROUP BY
	time,metric
ORDER BY 
 $__timeGroup(starttime,'1h')

SELECT
  $__timeGroup(starttime,'1h') as time,
  count(statedesc) AS 'value',
	case
     when statedesc = 'Answer' then statedesc
     else 'No Answer'
  end AS 'metric'
FROM 
	cm_hopper_history
WHERE
   voiceQueueId = '$campaign' 
   AND $__timeFilter(starttime)
GROUP BY
	time,metric
ORDER BY 
 $__timeGroup(starttime,'1h')

SELECT
  $__timeGroup(starttime,'1h') as time,
  count(statedesc) AS 'value',
	statedesc AS 'metric'
FROM 
	cm_hopper_history
WHERE
   voiceQueueId = '$campaign' AND starttime IS NOT null
GROUP BY
	time,metric
ORDER BY 
 $__timeGroup(starttime,'1h')

SELECT
  $__timeGroup(starttime,'1h') as time,
  count(statedesc) AS 'value',
	statedesc AS 'metric'
FROM 
	cm_hopper_history
WHERE
   voiceQueueId = '$campaign' AND $__timeFilter(starttime)
GROUP BY
	time,metric
ORDER BY 
 $__timeGroup(starttime,'1h')

SELECT
  $__timeGroup(starttime,'1h') as time,
  count(statedesc) AS 'value',
	statedesc AS 'metric'
FROM 
	cm_hopper_history
WHERE
   voiceQueueId = '$campaign' AND starttime IS NOT null
GROUP BY
	time,metric
ORDER BY 
 $__timeGroup(starttime,'1h')
SELECT DISTINCT(a.listid),b.name FROM cm_hopper a, cm_lists b WHERE a.listid=b.id AND a.voicequeueid='$campaign'

list.definition: select id as __value, name as __text from voice_queues where type='outbound'
list.label: Campaign
list.name: campaign
list.query: select id as __value, name as __text from voice_queues where type='outbound'
